You plan to visit 5 European cities for 20 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Seville for 3 days. You plan to stay in Berlin for 3 days. You would like to visit Athens for 6 days. You would like to meet your friends at Athens between day 3 and day 8 to tour together. You plan to stay in Riga for 6 days. You would like to visit Barcelona for 6 days. You plan to visit relatives in Barcelona between day 13 and day 18.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Berlin and Barcelona, from Athens to Riga, Berlin and Athens, Athens and Barcelona, Riga and Barcelona, Berlin and Riga, Barcelona and Seville.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 20 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
